Digital Skills Training

Upskill your team with modern digital skills — ready-to-teach, professionally delivered.

Business Training Packages

All group sessions are 90 minutes (1.5 hours) in length.

Package Price Description
Cybersecurity Essentials
1 session		 $150 Password hygiene, scam awareness, device security, and safe backup strategies.
Digital Workplace Fundamentals
2 sessions		 $250 Google Workspace or Microsoft 365, file management, scheduling, and communication basics.
AI Tools for Everyday Work
2 sessions		 $300 ChatGPT, AI tools for admin and marketing, plus best practices for ethical business use.
Workflow Optimization & Automation
3 sessions		 $350 Kanban systems, Zapier automation, and tools to simplify daily operations.
Programming Foundations for Staff
3 sessions		 $450 Beginner-friendly coding concepts using Python, scripting for spreadsheets, and optional web tools.
1-on-1 Private Tutoring
1-hour blocks		 $40 / hour Personalized tech training at your location or online, tailored to your goals.

Who Is This For?

These packages are ideal for small businesses and local organizations that want to improve digital skills, modernize workflows, and empower staff.

If you don't see the exact topic you need, reach out and I'll let you know if a custom training solution is possible.

Book a Session

All training sessions are available on-site in Fairview and surrounding areas, or virtually upon request.

Get in touch or call 780-330-9965 to schedule your team's training.
